data.title: Escape Tour Tournai. Play a City Escape Room outdoors!
data.meta_description: Discover the historic heart of Belgium in Tournai! Admire the UNESCO World Heritage Cathedral of Our Lady, the oldest belfry in the country and the uni...
data.text:
Escape Tour Tournai

Escape the everyday grind and dive into the rich history of Tournai, a hidden gem in Belgium. Although there is no Escape Tour (yet) to guide you through the hidden corners of this city, Tournai is a destination not to be missed for a fascinating day out. Explore the city like a true adventurer and be amazed by the beautiful architecture and enchanting stories each stone has to tell.

The imposing Notre-Dame Cathedral, a UNESCO World Heritage site, will undoubtedly catch your attention with its five spires poking proudly into the sky. But there is more: the Pont des Trous, a historic bridge with defense towers, and Tournai's belfry, the oldest in Belgium, are just a few examples of the sights you can admire during a city walk. Both culture lovers and history buffs will enjoy this city.

Are you looking for an interactive twist for your getaway? Although Tournai is still waiting for its own Escape Tour, we offer you plenty of other cities where you can play the escape game. Get swept up in a city game full of riddles, clues and historical stories that will change your view of the city forever. Accept the challenge and experience a day out like you've never done before.

While you wait for the launch of the Escape Tour in Tournai, immerse yourself in the mysteries and legends that this city holds. Imagine rushing through the ancient streets, looking for clues that will lead you to the next hidden treasure. Prepare yourself for a future adventure where Tournai's secrets will unfold before you in an exciting citygame experience. Until then, we invite you to discover the magic of escape games in one of the many other Belgian cities already ready to welcome you. Join us and let the game begin!

Unfortunately, there is no escape tour for Tournai yet....

But not to worry! There are plenty of other Escape Tours near Tournai! Want Tournai as a new city? Then click the button below!
